articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: NASA's Lunar Gateway space station will be so tiny that astronauts won't be able to stand - Daily Mail
articles.description: René Waclavicek, a space architect and design researcher at Austria-based LIQUIFER Space Systems, said the Lunar Gateway living quarters would total about 280 cubic feet.
articles.content:
Orbiting at 250 miles above the Earth, the International Space Station (ISS) has been integral to a bucket load of research over the past 25 years.

articles.title: NASA James Webb Space Telescope's most spectacular images - Daily Mail
articles.description: Since launching in 2021, NASA's $10 billion (£7.4 billion) James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has beamed back astonishing images of the cosmos with unprecedented detail.
articles.content:
Since launching on Christmas Day 2021, NASA's $10 billion (£7.4 billion) James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has beamed back astonishing images of the cosmos with unprecedented detail.

articles.author: Ian Randall
articles.title: Einstein's riddle solved with 'easy' solution that allows time travel 'back to your past' - Express
articles.description: In a rotating universe, particles can follow 'closed timelike curves' - in which they eventually end up in their own past.
